ud2.9:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati pubbarame migaramatupasade.
ud2.9:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena visakhaya migaramatuya kocideva attho ranne pasenadimhi kosale patibaddho hoti.
ud2.9:1.4: Tam raja pasenadi kosalo na yathadhippayam tireti.
ud2.9:2.1: Atha kho visakha migaramata diva divassa yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
ud2.9:2.2: Ekamantam nisinnam kho visakham migaramataram bhagava etadavoca:
ud2.9:2.3: “handa kuto nu tvam, visakhe, agacchasi diva divassa”ti?
ud2.9:2.4: “Idha me, bhante, kocideva attho ranne pasenadimhi kosale patibaddho;
ud2.9:2.5: tam raja pasenadi kosalo na yathadhippayam tireti”ti.
